DOC.brief_summary: The aim study assess effect give schoolmeal fatty fish , schoolmeal without fish omega-3 capsule Noregian adolescent cognitive performance ( concentration learn ability ) , mental health statua marker nutritional status . In addition , disentangle effect fatty fish eat food effect omega-3 fatty acid take supplement .
DOC.detailed_description: There increase attention role nutrition learn ability among schoolchildren . As diet provide human energy several essential nutrient , balance supply nutrient promote physical growth health , also cognitive development , help child learn infancy throughout adolescence beyond . In three-armed non-blinded intervention trial investigator test whether ingestion schoolmeal omega-3 capsule improve cognitive function among pupil 9th grade eight low secondary school . The pupil randomise three group , one group serve lunch fatty fish , one group serve similar lunch meat/cheese ( without fish ) one group recieve omega-3 capsule three time week period 12 week . At begin end study , pupils conduct cognitive test , blood- , urine- hair sample take . The pupil also answer questionnaire diet , physical activity , sleep pattern mental health .
